column3: School of Molecular and Cellular Biology
column5: Customise your study to your interests in the BiosciencesThis course will equip you with the expertise necessary to work at the forefront of modern bioscience. The knowledge and skills gained are applicable to fields as diverse as health, renewables, food, and agriculture.
